Difficulty.Remark:
Game difficulty
Note: Adjusting Difficult or Easy does not affect other parameters.

DayTimeSpeedRate.Remark:
Daytime passage speed
Note: Default parameters are 30 minutes for day and night each. Increasing the value makes time pass faster, shortening both day and night.
The wild boss's perceived respawn time is 30 minutes. Increasing the value will make the boss respawn faster.

NightTimeSpeedRate.Remark:
Nighttime passage speed
Note: Default parameters are 30 minutes for day and night each. Increasing the value makes time pass faster, shortening both day and night.
The wild boss's perceived respawn time is 30 minutes. Increasing the value will make the boss respawn faster.

PalCaptureRate.Remark:
Capture probability multiplier
Note: Parameter adjustment is highly sensitive, please adjust with caution. Difficult mode is 0.8, and Easy mode is 2.

PalSpawnNumRate.Remark:
Pal spawn quantity multiplier
Note: Default parameters are 1 fixed boss and 1-2 wild pals.
If adjusted to 2, the fixed boss becomes 2, and wild pals spawn 2-4. Adjusting beyond 3 often leads to overlapping or falling out of the map, so please adjust with caution.

PalDamageRateAttack.Remark:
Pal attack damage multiplier
Note: The higher the number, the stronger the pals, including both player-owned and wild pals.

PalDamageRateDefense.Remark:
Pal damage absorption multiplier
Note: The lower the number, the tougher the pals, including both player-owned and wild pals.

PlayerDamageRateAttack.Remark:
Player attack damage multiplier
Note: The higher the number, the stronger the player.

PlayerDamageRateDefense.Remark:
Player damage absorption multiplier
Note: The lower the number, the tougher the player.

PlayerStomachDecreaceRate.Remark:
Player satiety decrease multiplier
Note: The lower the number, the slower the decrease, meaning less hunger.

PlayerStaminaDecreaceRate.Remark:
Player stamina decrease multiplier
Note: The lower the number, the slower the decrease, indicating more stamina.
Player stamina affects the number of times they can gather, move, and roll in combat.

PlayerAutoHpRegeneRateInSleep.Remark: Player health regeneration multiplier during sleep

PalStomachDecreaceRate.Remark:
Pal satiety decrease multiplier
Note: The lower the number, the slower the decrease, meaning less hunger.

PalStaminaDecreaceRate.Remark:
Pal stamina decrease multiplier
Note: The lower the number, the slower the decrease, indicating more stamina.
Pal stamina affects large world movement and skill casting frequency.

PalAutoHpRegeneRateInSleep.Remark:
Pal health regeneration multiplier during sleep
Note: Health regeneration rate in Pal Terminal.

BuildObjectDeteriorationDamageRate.Remark:
Building deterioration speed multiplier
Note: The higher the value, the faster the deterioration.

CollectionDropRate.Remark:
Item collection amount multiplier
Note: Example - Hitting small Pal ore with a stone hammer yields 1 Pal fragment with a default requirement of 6 hits averaging 19 damage. If set to 3, it would take 2 hits averaging 19 damage.

CollectionObjectRespawnSpeedRate.Remark:
Collectible item respawn interval
Note: Default parameters - Trees and large ores respawn every 1 hour. Setting to 0 triggers immediate respawn (if fixed point ores aren't respawning, consider restarting the server to check).

EnemyDropItemRate.Remark:
Item drop quantity multiplier
Note: Tested with no upper limit.

Options.Item: Drop items excluding equipped gear and weapons
Options.All: Drop all items and team Pals (excluding Pals with items that cannot be dropped, such as saddles)

bEnableAimAssistKeyboard.Remark: Enable keyboard and mouse aim assist

DropItemMaxNum.Remark:
Maximum dropped items in the world
Note: Recommended 300-500

DropItemMaxNum_UNKO.Remark: Maximum excrement (UNKO) dropped items in the world

BaseCampWorkerMaxNum.Remark:
Maximum number of base workers
Note: Numbers over 15 currently do not take effect. Placing the save file into single-player allows modification of the limit to 20.

DropItemAliveMaxHours.Remark:
Dropped item retention time (hours)
Note: Recommended 0.5 to prevent excessive dropped items causing lag.

bAutoResetGuildNoOnlinePlayers.Remark: Enable automatic clearing of guild members

AutoResetGuildTimeNoOnlinePlayers.Remark: Automatic clearing of guild members time (hours)

PalEggDefaultHatchingTime.Remark:
Time required for giant egg hatching (hours)
Note: Other eggs will also have corresponding changes in hatching time.

WorkSpeedRate.Remark:
Work speed multiplier
Note: Not recommended to exceed 5.

bCanPickupOtherGuildDeathPenaltyDrop.Remark: 【PVP】Allow picking up other guild's death penalty drops in PvP

bIsStartLocationSelectByMap.Remark:
Allow selecting starting location from the map
Note: If disabled, spawn on the initial plateau. After death, you can still choose other spawn points.

bExistPlayerAfterLogout.Remark: Automatically shut down the server after all players log out

CoopPlayerMaxNum.Remark: Maximum number of players in a team

ServerPlayerMaxNum.Remark: Maximum number of players playing on the server at the same time
